pr_title: Fix #2115: Add Support for keeping both v1alpha1 and v1beta1 apis in tekton extensions

timeline.message: - tekton: generation model for v1alpha1 and v1beta1

timeline.author: manusa

timeline.message:
Fix #2115: Add Support for keeping both v1alpha1 and v1beta1 apis in tekton extensions

Added dsl support for `client.v1alpha1().*` and `client.v1beta1().*` for respective
apigroups
